text: D. Train was a R&B; post-disco band from the New York, United States. They were formed in 1980. In band there is James "D-Train" Williams and Hubert Eaves III. Hubert plays on keyboard, bass guitar and drums, James uses vocals as a musical instrument. This duo have some hits on Billboard Dance & Billboard R&B; charts. Their songs include "Keep On" (1982), "Walk on By" (1982), "You're The One For Me" (1982). They also did the song named "Pokérap" from Pokémon soundtrack album 2BA Master. Category:Musical groups from New York City Category:Disco groups Category:Soul bands Category:American R&B; bands
title: D. Train
